containerDefinitions.name: postgres-client
command: echo '=== VPC Lattice Pattern C - Database Connection Test ===' && echo 'Start time:' $(date) && echo && echo '[DNS Test] Aurora Writer endpoint' && getent hosts pattern-c-aurora-cluster.cluster-cpo0q8m8sxzx.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com || echo 'DNS lookup failed' && echo && echo '[DNS Test] Aurora Reader endpoint' && getent hosts pattern-c-aurora-cluster.cluster-ro-cpo0q8m8sxzx.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com || echo 'DNS lookup failed' && echo && echo '[DNS Test] RDS Proxy Writer endpoint' && getent hosts pattern-c-rds-proxy-reader.endpoint.proxy-cpo0q8m8sxzx.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com || echo 'DNS lookup failed' && echo && echo '[Connection Test] Aurora Writer' && export PGPASSWORD=password123 && timeout 30 psql -h pattern-c-aurora-cluster.cluster-cpo0q8m8sxzx.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d testdb -c "SELECT 'Aurora Writer' as endpoint, current_user, inet_server_addr() as pattern-c-aurora-cluster.cluster-ro-cpo0q8m8sxzx.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d testdb -c "SELECT 'Aurora Reader' as endpoint, current_user, inet_server_addr() as db_ip, version();" pattern-c-rds-proxy.proxy-cpo0q8m8sxzx.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d testdb -c "SELECT 'RDS Proxy Writer' as endpoint, current_user, inet_server_addr() as db_ip, version();" || echo 'Connection failed or timeout' && echo && echo '[Connection Test] RDS Proxy Reader' && export PGPASSWORD=password123 && timeout 30 psql -h pattern-c-rds-proxy-reader.endpoint.proxy-cpo0q8m8sxzx.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d testdb -c "SELECT 'RDS Proxy Reader' as endpoint, current_user, inet_server_addr() as db_ip, version();" || echo 'Connection failed or timeout' && echo && echo 'End time:' $(date) && echo '=== Test Complete ==='
